title: Hi, I'm Yogita Singh
subtitle: I'm a UX designer. I'm passionate about
creating usable digital products.
about: I am a UI/UX designer with a passion for creating aesthetically pleasing and efficient websites. I am seeking opportunities to further enhance my skills and experience while contributing to an organization's success.
The word which best describes me is that I am a CURIOUS person. Curiosity propels us forward. My go-to thought.

Above written line in motivation is from one of my favourite books "I came upon a lighthouse by Shantanu Naidu " and I recommend you to read it. I am also an avid reader and I enjoy reading in my spare time. Art , poetry and nature fascinate me the most.
